generated_text:
- road: The road surface with white lane markings is visible in the foreground and extends into the background.
- sidewalk: The paved area beside the road where pedestrians are walking, bordered by curbs and some bollards, is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: The large yellowish building with windows and signage is a building.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the sidewalk in front of the building.
- pole: A vertical pole with a traffic sign attached is visible in the middle of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the image, above the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A yellow diamond-shaped traffic sign with black markings is mounted on the pole.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible in the landscaped areas near the sidewalk.
- person: Two pedestrians are walking on the sidewalk.
- car: A car is visible on the road to the left side of the image.
